mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record SET CreateTime = #{CreateTime}, RecordCode = #{RecordCode}, DianXinCode = #{DianXinCode}, DeviceUser = #{DeviceUser}, DeviceCode = ( SELECT DeviceCode FROM device WHERE DianXinCode = #{DianXinCode} LIMIT 1)
mapper.select: SELECT * from record WHERE DeviceCode in (SELECT DeviceCode from device WHERE DeviceUser = #{DeviceUser} or DeviceCode='root') ORDER BY CreateTime DESC
